channel.title: Bend Time Story on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bend Time Story on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Hyperflexible People Who May Help Unlock Better Sleep Apnea Treatments
item.description: Patients with Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome are six times more at risk for the sleeping disorder. Now scientists are studying them in hopes of finding remedies beyond the CPAP machine.
